group_1.narration: This weird dream of me 'n Momo's@is still going on.
I dunno how it works exactly,@but every time I take a bite out of an apple,@I move onto the next part.
Some things make zero sense to me,@like all that talk about the end of the world.
But everything feels like@it's actually happened before...
I wonder what I'll dream about next?

group_1.textLeft: This place...
Our father's church...!

group_1.textRight: That's right.@This is where you were born and raised.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey...!
Don't tell me you're gonna yammer on and on@about the end of the world.

group_1.textRight: What would it mean if I did?

group_1.textLeft: It'd mean you ain't the real Kyubey.
You'd be a fake, a product of my dream.

group_1.textRight: That's right. I'm just a character in your dream.

group_1.textLeft: You just came right out and said it...
Alright, then, what's going on with this dream?
You came from this dream,@so that means you oughta know, yeah?

group_1.textRight: I don't believe your logic is sound.
Still, I can point out a few observations.

group_1.textLeft: Go on.

group_1.textRight: This dream sequence is a reflection...
...of the things you have experienced in reality@over the past few days.
Furthermore, you are seeing these events...

group_1.textLeft: So in other words, Ui introduced me to Kagome@in the real world,
and then after meetin' Mami and Ren,@I came here?
Why'd I come to my father's church, though?

group_1.textRight: You can't remember?@Then there's nothing I can tell you.
You came here out of your own free will.
You're the only one who can answer that@question.

group_1.textLeft: You want me to remember for myself, huh...?
(...Right.)
(It wasn't like there was one defining moment...)
(I've been going against myself and@using magic to help people,)
(so Madoka and her buddies think@I'm a big ol' softie.)
(Then there's how I promised to help those@bleeding hearts hunt that Witch...)
(As all these little things kept addin' up...)
(Lately, it's been makin' me feel like...)
(Like I'm losing myself.)
(...So that's why I figured I'd come back here,)
(to remember that feeling I had@when I swore to myself,)
("I'll never use magic for another person again.")
Yeah, you're right.
It was tough hearin' that story about how someone@tryin' to be nice ended up ruining things for those@two sister cats.
...But thanks to that, I remembered.
I wished for a miracle for my father,
and my family was destroyed as a result...
And that left...just me and Momo...
...?!@[wait:1.0][chara:200652:cheek_0][chara:200652:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:200652:lipSynch_1]No!
You think so too, Momo?
Momo is...already...
(She has to be dead...!)
